snippet: PARDEE--Margaret. The Juilliard School is deeply saddened by the passing of violinist and pedagogue Margaret Pardee. A longtime Juilliard faculty member from 1942 until 2008, she also was an alumnus of the school. She was passionate about her art and teaching, and she nurtured her students. Many of her former students have gone on to successful careers as soloists and members of leading orchestras all over the world. Her generous gift of numerous, extraordinary violins and violas to the Juilliard instrument collection will also contribute to the next generation of players. We extend our condolences to her family, friends, colleagues, and students. Joseph W. Polisi, President Ara Guzelimian, Provost and Dean Yoheved Kaplinsky, Artistic Director, Juilliard Pre-College Division 1/3
